body_html: Absolutely, let's talk tomorrow! (Using input_map would modify all consumers of the reshape node so that they took the placeholder instead. In the present implementation, the reshape node would actually still be in the graph, but nothing would be connected to it, and it probably wouldn't ever be executed.)

body: Absolutely, let's talk tomorrow! (Using `input_map` would modify all consumers of the reshape node so that they took the placeholder instead. In the present implementation, the reshape node would actually still be in the graph, but nothing would be connected to it, and it probably wouldn't ever be executed.)
